input_email_body:
Subject: Billing Dispute Issue

Dear Customer Support,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm writing to address a billing dispute regarding the renewal of my Office 365 subscription. I was incorrectly charged for both Excel and Email services. This subscription is linked to account number <acc_num>. I believe the incorrect charge appeared on my latest statement dated <date>. I would appreciate your prompt assistance in resolving this billing issue. You can reach me at <tel_num> or reply to this email for further discussion You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. Thank you for your attention.

Sincerely,
<name> My name is Carlos Mendoza.
